Europeans rule out sending troops to Ukraine as Russia rebukes MacronGermany, Britain and other European countries said on Tuesday they had no plans to send ground troops to Ukraine, after France hinted at the possibility, and the Kremlin warned that any such move would inevitably lead to conflict between Russia and NATO. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 14:17:46 GMT 5EY6PE6CJFPGZOO34K43JUZJSE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/europeans-rule-out-sending-troops-ukraine-Russia-rebukes-macron-2024-02-27/Andreas Rinke, Guy Faulconbridge世界欧洲
Ukraine's Zelenskiy says he is Saudi Arabia on working visitUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy arrived in Saudi Arabia on a working visit on Tuesday to meet Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, according to a statement posted on his Telegram account. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 14:05:43 GMT MWQEGKFDVRK75IQF7SW5LZO66M https://www.reuters.com/world/ukraines-zelenskiy-says-he-is-saudi-arabia-working-visit-2024-02-27/Reuters世界
Gaza residents fear possible truce would only pause, not stop, the warHomeless, hungry Palestinians fearing an Israeli assault on their last relatively safe haven in Gaza said they were desperate for a lasting ceasefire as the United States said a temporary truce could be agreed soon. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 13:56:24 GMT FAXDU23MMNJONELKUI2KBRNGV4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-residents-fear-possible-truce-would-only-pause-not-stop-war-2024-02-27/Saleh Salem, Ibraheem Abu Mustafa世界中东
Russia says its forces capture Ukrainian village near AvdiivkaRussia's Defence Ministry said on Tuesday its forces had made further progress in eastern Ukraine by taking control of the village of Severne near Avdiivka, a Ukrainian town it captured earlier this month. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 13:07:29 GMT FHP5AVZNGVNWVDHZ7YELF62OWU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-its-forces-capture-ukrainian-village-near-avdiivka-2024-02-27/Reuters世界欧洲
Polish farmers rally in Warsaw against EU policies, Ukraine importsThousands of Polish farmers took to the streets of Warsaw on Tuesday, carrying the national flag and blowing handheld horns, escalating a protest which started early February against food imports from Ukraine and European Union green rules. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 13:04:11 GMT C53RYB3PR5M7JOKRAMLNAYPVVQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-farmers-rally-warsaw-against-eu-policies-ukraine-imports-2024-02-27/Reuters世界欧洲
Israel holds local elections under cloud of warIsrael held local elections under the shadow of war on Tuesday, with tens of thousands of voters who have been evacuated from areas near Gaza and the northern border with Lebanon forced to wait until later in the year to cast a ballot. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 13:00:50 GMT OK47Y5H5MJMI7BZR2FPLEYYZMI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-holds-local-elections-under-cloud-war-2024-02-27/Dedi Hayun, Herbert Villaraga世界中东
Jordan's King Abdullah says Gaza aid must be doubled to stem crisisJordan's King Abdullah said on Tuesday that humanitarian aid to Gaza must be doubled to prevent a deterioration in a hunger crisis affecting over 2 million people. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 12:41:24 GMT 5AQITQBKU5PWVMHZK54HM6N2NU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/jordans-king-abdullah-says-gaza-aid-must-be-doubled-stem-crisis-2024-02-27/Reuters世界中东
Yellen: Moves to unlock value of frozen Russian assets 'necessary and urgent'U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen on Tuesday underscored the urgency of moving forward together with Western allies to unlock the value of frozen Russian sovereign assets to help Ukraine, but said the U.S. had no "preferred strategy" for how to do so. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 12:34:00 GMT RPJEWQRPMROXXNEC7KSJ2CYWZA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/yellen-moves-unlock-value-frozen- Russian-assets-necessary-urgent-2024-02-27/Andrea Shalal世界欧洲
Yellen says Israel resuming tax revenue transfers to Palestinian AuthorityIsrael has agreed to resume transferring tax revenues to the Palestinian Authority to fund basic services and bolster the West Bank economy, and money has begun to flow, U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said on Tuesday. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 12:30:47 GMT WUJXICPSYVNB5DCFEZLHW52YHA https://www.reuters.com/world/yellen-says-israel-resuming-tax-revenue-transfers-palestinian-authority-2024-02-27/Andrea Shalal世界
Germany's Scholz rules out Western ground troops for UkraineGerman Chancellor Olaf Scholz on Tuesday ruled out suggestions that European countries and NATO alliance members would send ground troops to Ukraine, a day after French President Emmanuel Macron had raised the prospect that some might do so. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 12:15:25 GMT DGNORTJEBRNLDBPGLPQZ6BR2OY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/germanys-scholz-rules-out-western-ground-troops-ukraine-2024-02-27/Andreas Rinke, Matthias Williams世界欧洲
Inside the Democratic rebellion against Biden over the Gaza warThe depth of Democratic Party anger over President Joe Biden’s handling of the Gaza war has caught his campaign off guard and could depress support in November’s election, according to Reuters interviews with more than a dozen senior party and campaign officials and five dozen voters and activists. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 12:07:49 GMT 66X2OPWPKJKN3FT3BMMRX7JVNA https://www.reuters.com/world/us/inside-democratic-rebellion-against-biden-over-gaza-war-2024-02-27/Andrea Shalal, Nandita Bose, Kat Stafford世界美国
